name: INZIPID
description:
The one wakes up in a well with no idea where he is. Exploring the world he finds at least two hard conflicting parties. He knows for sure what's right and who's wrong.
But only in the beginning.

  • Inspired by sci-fi novel Prisoners of Power (Arkady and Boris Strugatsky)
  • 2.5D platformer in an atmosphere of desolation and lifelessness
  • INZIPID world is a dilapidating civilization of artificial intelligence
